sentences: Ohvrid on nii kurbad. Nendel pole midagi teha.
Mina ei tea, miks nad ohvreid vaikusse püsisid.
Tema tõeline isiklikuks olime, mis tean meie kõikjal sellest.
context: The word 'ohvrid' in Estonian translates to prisoners or captives. It typically refers to people who are held against their will by force or authority and unable to leave voluntarily. The term is commonly used when talking about military prisoners, hostages, or anyone being detained illegally.
